title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits a powerful ring and must destroy it to save Middle-earth.

title: The Lord Of The Rings :The Two Towers
description: The second installment of the epic fantasy trilogy, following the journey of Frodo and his companions as they continue their quest to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final installment of the epic fantasy trilogy, where the forces of good and evil clash in a battle for Middle-earth.

title: Inception
description: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing methamphetamine.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young woman is forced to seek help from a brilliant psychiatrist to catch a serial killer.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja strives to become the strongest ninja and gain the respect of his village.

title: Naruto Shippuden
description: The continuation of Naruto's journey as he faces new challenges and powerful enemies in his quest to protect his village.
